scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Renai Circulation' (恋愛サーキュレーション). AZKi is on stage wearing a pink cat-eared hoodie outfit.
Transition to and performance of the song 'Hitokuchi, Chodai?' (ひとくち、ちょうだい？).
